body:
> IGES is a Vectorworks export option.
> 
> I'm not clear what bricad is.


IGES provides you with higher level geometry then the DXF-faces could. 
brlcad is an open source cad package, coming with converters (im- and 
export). You can convert IGES to brlcad to OBJ, which should produce 
very clean OBJ files. Than you can enjoy the great OBJ-support in 
Radiance, including smooth surfaces and all the neat stuff...


You can script the whole procedure.


CU Lars.
___
